metadata.name: Exotic Den Token
metadata.description:
This OE will not only be a raffle ticket to win some of the last allowlist spots to Exotic Heroes, it will also act as a key to our token gated discord and receive a special role . You may want an extra couple incase we decide to burn for something else later in the game ;) . Essentially it will function as an introductory pass to everything Exotic. I’m filled with gratitude and excitement. If you like my content so far, there will be so much more coming. More music… More art… More exotic than ever before. Thank you for being here and I hope this first official Exotic Heroes OE makes people smile when they see it in their wallets.

As always music by me. This song is called "Me Day" and I am Exotic Raccoon :). It's currently unreleased... for now
